languages.text: "Вы чрезвычайно метки в наблюдениях!" {n}Человек негромко и мелодично смеется, затем качает головой.{/n} "Путь к дружбе с таким благородным созданием тернист, и в момент нашего особенно глубокого разногласия мне пришлось заменить руку..."

"You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."
languages.original_text: "Вы чрезвычайно метки в наблюдениях!" {n}Человек негромко и мелодично смеется, затем качает головой.{/n} "Путь к дружбе с таким благородным созданием тернист, и в момент нашего особенно глубокого разногласия мне пришлось заменить руку..."

traits.locale_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

"You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

languages.text: "Eure Beobachtungsgabe ist bemerkenswert!" {n}Der Mann lacht leise und melodisch und schüttelt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Freundschaft zu einer so edlen Kreatur zu entwickeln, ist ein dorniger Weg, und nach einer kurzen, aber sehr grundsätzlichen Meinungsverschiedenheit musste ich meine Hand ersetzen lassen ..."
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Beobachtungsgabe ist bemerkenswert!" {n}Der Mann lacht leise und melodisch und schüttelt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Freundschaft zu einer so edlen Kreatur zu entwickeln, ist ein dorniger Weg, und nach einer kurzen, aber sehr grundsätzlichen Meinungsverschiedenheit musste ich meine Hand ersetzen lassen ..."

languages.text: « Vous êtes très perspicace ! » {n}Il lâche un petit rire mélodieux, puis secoue la tête.{/n} « Tisser des liens avec une si noble créature n'est pas aisé. Après un moment de profond désaccord, j'ai dû faire remplacer ma main... »
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes très perspicace ! » {n}Il lâche un petit rire mélodieux, puis secoue la tête.{/n} « Tisser des liens avec une si noble créature n'est pas aisé. Après un moment de profond désaccord, j'ai dû faire remplacer ma main... »

languages.text: “大人，您真是慧眼如炬！”{n}商人发出了柔和、悦耳的笑声，随后摇了摇头。{/n}“与如此高贵的生物发展友谊，着实是条荆棘之路。某次，我们之间发生了严重的分歧，后来我不得不换只假手……”
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您真是慧眼如炬！”{n}商人发出了柔和、悦耳的笑声，随后摇了摇头。{/n}“与如此高贵的生物发展友谊，着实是条荆棘之路。某次，我们之间发生了严重的分歧，后来我不得不换只假手……”

languages.text: «¡Tiene usted un ojo excepcional!». {n}El hombre se ríe de forma suave y melodiosa y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Entablar amistad con una criatura tan noble es un camino peliagudo, y, después de un desacuerdo especialmente profundo, tuve que reemplazar mi mano...».
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Tiene usted un ojo excepcional!». {n}El hombre se ríe de forma suave y melodiosa y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Entablar amistad con una criatura tan noble es un camino peliagudo, y, después de un desacuerdo especialmente profundo, tuve que reemplazar mi mano...».

languages.text: 「あなたは実に観察力が鋭いですね！」{n}男は柔らかく心地よい笑い声を上げてから、首を振った。{/n}「こんな高貴な生き物と友情を築くのは困難な道でして。特に深刻な意見の不一致があった瞬間に、手を取り替えねばならなくなりました…」
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは実に観察力が鋭いですね！」{n}男は柔らかく心地よい笑い声を上げてから、首を振った。{/n}「こんな高貴な生き物と友情を築くのは困難な道でして。特に深刻な意見の不一致があった瞬間に、手を取り替えねばならなくなりました…」

languages.text: "Fevkalade bir gözlemcisiniz!" {n}Lussarius, yumuşak ve melodik bir kahkaha atarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Böylesine asil bir yaratıkla dostluk kurmak dikenli bir yol. Aramızda geçen derin bir anlaşmazlığın ardından elimin değiştirilmesi gerekti."
languages.original_text: "You are exceptionally observant!" {n}The man laughs softly and melodiously, then shakes his head.{/n} "Developing a friendship with such a noble creature is a thorny path, and after a moment of especially profound disagreement I had to have my hand replaced..."
